title: Panasonic Announces Availability of Video Insight VMS Software and Unlimited Video Insight License
text:
Panasonic Announces Availability of Video Insight VMS Software and Unlimited Video Insight License Free 60 day Trial Software Now Available for Download September 08, 2015 10:52 AM   
NEWARK, N.J.- Panasonic, a leading provider of integrated security and video surveillance solutions, has announced the availability and immediate launch of its Video Insight Video Management Software (VMS) software. The global solutions surveillance leader acquired Texas based Video Insight earlier in 2015 and is now beginning roll and sales of their powerful video management software platform. 
Complementing Panasonic’s popular embedded surveillance solutions, Video Insight’s software broadens Panasonic’s surveillance recording and monitoring offerings and gives end users a true software-based option to choose from when architecting their security solution. Video Insight’s VMS platform is well suited for surveillance in schools, universities, hospitals, healthcare, law enforcement and SMB vertical markets. 
Video Insight VMS is an open platform system that supports more than 3,000 camera models from 100 manufacturers and integrates with the most popular access control systems. The VMS is a highly integrated, easy-to-use video management software that offers an intuitive user interface, robust client options for Windows, Mac OS and mobile devices as well as its own built-in access control. It also provides integration to more than 131 encoders so users can optimize their analog-to-IP migration paths. 
Now, security professionals who purchased select* Panasonic i-PRO video surveillance cameras manufactured after October 2014 are eligible for an unlimited camera license for use with the Video Insight VMS, resulting in a significant reduction in users’ total cost of ownership. 
For those thinking about trying a VMS system, a free, 60-day trial of the Video Insight Video Management Software is available now via complimentary download. The software trial gives security professionals a risk-free opportunity to experience Video Insight VMS, a powerful and elegant enterprise-class surveillance recording and monitoring solution. 
Download your Free Trial today at: http://info.panasonic.com/VI-free-60-day-trial.html . 
*Unlimited license for select Panasonic i-PRO cameras manufactured after October 2014. For a full list of eligible i-PRO cameras visit 
For more information about Panasonic’s full line of surveillance solutions please visit www.us.panasonic.com/security . 
About Video Insight, Inc. 
Video Insight, a member company of the Panasonic Group, is headquartered in Houston, TX and is a leading developer of enterprise-class video management software (VMS). Founded in 2002 by two veteran technology entrepreneurs, Video Insight was established with the vision of providing powerful, user-friendly software that would run on "off-the-shelf" hardware based on IP technology. Video Insight has built a strong foundation by marketing to North American K-12 and higher education institutions. As a result, more than 6,500 schools and campuses rely on Video Insight to protect their students, teachers, and facilities. With market adoption, Video Insight has successfully assimilated its versatile, highly scalable product to government, retail, aviation and other commercial markets. 
Panasonic Solutions for Business 
Panasonic delivers game-changing technology solutions that deliver a customized experience to drive better outcomes—for our customers and our customers’ customers. Panasonic engineers reliable products and solutions that help to create, capture and deliver data of all types, where, when and how it is needed. The complete suite of Panasonic professional solutions for government and commercial enterprises of all sizes addresses unified business communications, mobile computing, security and surveillance, retail point-of-sale, office productivity, visual communications (projectors, displays, digital signage) and HD video production. Panasonic solutions for business are delivered by Panasonic System Communications Company of North America, Division of Panasonic Corporation of North America, the principal North American subsidiary of Panasonic Corporation. 
All brand and company/product names are trademarks or registered trademarks of the respective companies. All specifications are subject to change without notice. Information on Panasonic solutions for business can be obtained by calling 877-803-8492 or at us.panasonic.com/business-solutions/. 
About Panasonic Corporation of North America 
Panasonic Corporation of North America provides a broad line of digital and other electronics products and solutions for consumer, business and industrial use. The company is the principal North American subsidiary of Osaka, Japan-based Panasonic Corporation and the hub of Panasonic’s U.S. branding, marketing, sales, service and R&D operations. In Interbrand’s 2014 annual “Best Global Green Brands” report, Panasonic ranked number five overall and the top electronics brand in the report. As part of continuing sustainability efforts, Panasonic Corporation of North America relocated its headquarters to a new facility, built to meet LEED certification standards, adjacent to Newark Penn Station in Newark, NJ.
